name: Haverty Furniture Companies, Inc.
description: Haverty Furniture Companies, Inc. is a well-established retailer in the home furnishings industry, known for its commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. Founded in 1885 by J.J. Haverty and his brother, the company has built a legacy of providing stylish and functional furniture that meets the diverse needs of its customers. Headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, Havertys operates more than 120 showrooms across the United States, primarily in the Southeast and Southwest regions. The company offers a wide range of products, including living room, dining room, and bedroom furniture, as well as home decor accessories. Havertys is recognized for its craftsmanship and collaboration with renowned designers, ensuring that its offerings remain contemporary and appealing. The company's strong focus on customer service is evident in its personalized shopping experience, where trained associates guide customers to find the perfect pieces for their homes. In addition to traditional furniture, Havertys also emphasizes sustainability and eco-friendly practices, sourcing materials responsibly and offering products that are built to last. With a robust online presence, customers can browse and purchase items through the company’s website, enhancing accessibility and convenience. As Havertys continues to grow, it remains dedicated to its mission of enhancing homes and enriching lives through exceptional furniture and service.
